content: **a purr-fectly playful coaster with a dash of cattitude ** this coaster not only adds a touch of playfulness to your home but also carries the spirit of creativity and improvisation i hope you enjoy making it as much as i did **get creative ** customize your cattitude coaster by experimenting with different color combinations or adding your own unique embroidery details **what s included ** your purchase includes a downloadable pdf pattern with detailed step-by-step instructions photos for guidance and optional embroidery designs to bring your cat coaster to life **difficulty level ** **very simple perfect for beginners** familiar with basic crochet stitches and techniques like slip_stitch double_crochet stacked single_crochet magic_ring and color changes **terminology ** american crochet terminology **size ** the finished coaster measures approximately 9 x 9 cm 3 5 x 3 5 inches **materials needed ** - two contrasting colors of weight 2 yarn - 2 5mm crochet hook - needle - scissors **usage rights ** this pattern is for personal use only you may sell finished items but please credit the designer kami tomczak kami crochet **support ** if you have any questions while working on the pattern feel free to reach out i m here to help **ready to add some cattitude to your home ** grab your crochet hook and start crafting today follow me 1 instagram @kami_crochet_x tiktok @kami crochet youtube @kami_crochet 1 https //linktr ee/kami_crochet
